title: Strengthening Web Development Practical Competencies: Thematic Focus for Improving Higher Education Learning Behaviors and Pedagogical Knowledge

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can systematically design science problem-solving strategies using thematic analysis methods
Learners can visualize their pedagogical content knowledge (instructional knowledge) and incorporate it into learning strategies
Learners can write a comparative analysis report on the strengths/weaknesses of digital and traditional instructional methods
Learners can perform effective role allocation in PBL team projects based on peer feedback
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
